comments.content:
I am surprised i couldn't find a thread discussing this, but I suspect it is custom lettering, probably based on Bodoni.

- Mike Yanega
[Times New Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20150122201834/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/times-new-roman/regular/) is pretty close to me...
thanks , I supose its costom then.

Ryuk - Been to the opticians lately?

Nick Cooke

You just saved my life Nick! I was totally wrong... It's clearly not Times New Roman... but Times New Roman **Bold**!  
Thanks to my new pair of glasses, here is what I finally got only after 15 minutes of intensive work (mainly (re)moving points and matching original kerning).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150122201834im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Lanvin_5562.gif)
